thread.title: Processor Conference 2015 October 6 – 7 in Santa Clara
thread.title_full: Processor Conference 2015 October 6 – 7 in Santa Clara

title: Processor Conference 2015 October 6 – 7 in Santa Clara
text:
This article was posted on 10/05/2015 Processor Conference 2015 October 6 – 7 in Santa Clara One of the industry's premier technical events 
The Linley Processor Conference will be held on Tuesday October 6th and Wednesday October 7th at the Hyatt Regency Hotel in Santa Clara, CA. Registration starts at 8:00am. 
The conference features technical presentations addressing embedded processors for communications, IoT, and advanced automotive systems. This in-depth technical conference has become one of the industry's premier technical events and figures to include a number of new product announcements. There will be over 20 technical presentations and a keynote session covering technology and market trends in embedded processors. 
On Tuesday sessions will be devoted to high-performance processor design, IoT client SoCs, Secure IoT gateways, network security, and high-speed packet processing. Wednesday sees processors for cloud systems, the future of assisted and autonomous driving, and advanced automotive applications. (See: www.linleygroup.com) 
Learn more about Electronic Products Magazine Related Articles
